original_text: when you obey the voice of the Lord your God, to keep his commandments and his statutes that are written in this Book of the Law, when you turn to the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul.
korean_text: 네가 네 하나님 여호와의 말씀을 청종하여 이 율법책에 기록된 그의 명령과 규례를 지키고 네 마음을 다하며 뜻을 다하여 여호와 네 하나님께 돌아오면

sentences.original_text: when you obey the voice of the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너의 하나님 여호와의 음성을 청종할 때에

sentences.original_text: to keep his commandments and his statutes
that are written in this Book of the Law
when you turn to the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너의 하나님 여호와께로 돌아올 때에

sentences.original_text: with all your heart and with all your soul
sentences.korean_translation: 네 온 마음과 네 온 영혼으로
